name: Greek Salad
description: The famous green salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives, and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

name: Bruschetta
description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.

name: Lemon Dessert
description: A traditional Mediterranean dessert featuring layers of light, fluffy lemon mousse on a bed of crushed biscotti, topped with fresh lemon zest.

name: Pasta
description: Handmade pasta tossed in our signature tomato and basil sauce, finished with aged parmesan and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

name: Grilled Fish
description: Catch of the day grilled to perfection, seasoned with Mediterranean herbs and served with a side of roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.
